attributes.action: Outlaw Cold calling and Doorstep Selling.
attributes.additional_details: We call for the outlawing of unsolicited telephoning, and doorstep calling, for the purpose of selling goods or  services of any kind, and for tick boxes on forms to always be in the form of granting, rather than refusing,  permission, as in "Tick here if you wish to be contacted", rather than "tick here if you do not wish to be contacted".
